abstract.t: The "amr" (Authentication Methods References) claim is defined and registered in the IANA "JSON Web Token Claims" registry but no standard Authentication Method Reference values are currently defined. This specification establishes a registry for Authentication Method Reference values and defines an initial set of Authentication Method Reference values. It also defines the "amr_values" (requested Authentication Method Reference values) request parameter for requesting that a set of Authentication Method Reference values be used for processing the Authentication Request.
